verses.plain: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.

tokens.t: a new song: sing unto the

verses.plain: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.

tokens.t: , bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.

verses.plain: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.

tokens.t: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.

verses.plain: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.

tokens.t: great, and greatly to be praised: he
to be feared above all gods.

verses.plain: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.

tokens.t: For all the gods of the nations

verses.plain: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.

tokens.t: , O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the

verses.plain: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.

tokens.t: his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.

verses.plain: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.

tokens.t: in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.

verses.plain: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.

tokens.t: reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.

verses.plain: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.

tokens.t: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.

verses.plain: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice

tokens.t: Let the field be joyful, and all that
therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice

verses.plain: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.

tokens.t: : for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.

footnotes.text: in the…: or, in the glorious sanctuary
the fulness…: or, all it containeth
